verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_7: Surely what you are promised will happen.
verse.verse_10: And the mountains are blown away.
verse.verse_12: Until which day is it deferred?
verse.verse_14: And what will teach you what the Day of Decision is?
verse.verse_15: Woe on that Day to the liars.
verse.verse_16: Did We not destroy the ancients?
verse.verse_17: Then succeeded them with the others?
verse.verse_18: This is how We deal with the guilty.
verse.verse_19: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.
verse.verse_20: Did We not create you from an insignificant fluid?
verse.verse_21: Then lodged it in a secure place?
verse.verse_23: We measured precisely. We are the best to measure.
verse.verse_24: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.
verse.verse_25: Did We not make the earth a homestead?
verse.verse_26: For the living and the dead?
verse.verse_27: And set on it lofty mountains, and given you pure water to drink?
verse.verse_28: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verse.verse_29: "Proceed to what you used to deny."
verse.verse_30: "Proceed to a shadow of three different masses."
verse.verse_31: Offering no shade, and unavailing against the flames.
verse.verse_33: As if they were yellow camels.
verse.verse_34: Woe on that Day to the liars.
verse.verse_35: This is a Day when they will not speak.
verse.verse_36: And they will not be allowed to apologize.
verse.verse_37: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.
verse.verse_38: This is the Day of Separation; We have gathered you, together with the ancients.
verse.verse_39: So if you have a strategy, use it against Me.
verse.verse_40: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.
verse.verse_41: The righteous will be amidst shades and fountains.
verse.verse_43: "Eat and drink pleasantly, for what you used to do."
verse.verse_44: This is how We reward the doers of good.
verse.verse_45: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verse.verse_46: "Eat and enjoy yourselves a little; you are indeed criminals."
verse.verse_47: Woe on that Day to the liars.
verse.verse_48: And when it is said to them, "Kneel", they do not kneel.
verse.verse_49: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.
verse.verse_50: In what message, beyond this, will they believe?
